34838.summary: Some customers in the Southwestern area of Lloydminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34838.title: Mar 12 – Lloyminster (Southwest) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
